Thank you so much for saving me. I can increase your attack and defense power by 3 percent. Do you want me to do it now?

Alas, my age is catching up to me. I can fight no more. Brave young man, you should take this Staff of Wisdom since I have no use for it. It will reveal the strength of monsters so you could better prepare your fight against them. Take care and good luck.
There are doors which cannot be opened with a key. To open them, you will have to defeat the monsters which guard them.
After you make a purchase from a merchant, go talk to him again because he will tell you some important information.
I heard that there are two hidden red keys hidden in this area.

Thank god, you saved me! I was stuck in the tunnel because the slime-man blocked the exit. Take this bottle of Elixir as a symbol of my gratitude. It recovers your health based on your attack and defense power. The stronger you are, the more health you will recover.
Many knights had failed to pass this area because of those Rock Monsters. Their defenses are just too high. Maybe you should increase your offense at the altar a few time in this area.
Do you know the Archmage in this area is the owner of this tower? He is way too strong for you now. Fighting him is suicide. You should go to higher floors and get stronger first.
It is said that there is a hidden message in this floor.
Go 0F!
At this current stage, if you have 1500 health, 80 attack, 98 defense, 5 yellow keys and 1 blue key, you are almost ideal.
The attack power of the swordsmen is too high. You should only fight them when you can one shot them, or you will lose a lot of health.
More haste, less speed.
If you find the four secret tunnels in this floor, you will be able to go upstairs without fighting strong enemies.
This floor is an item warehouse, but to get the treasure, you will have to use the mattock.
At three o\'clock, the secret treasure which allows you to teleport three time will appear.
Mages can attack from a distance with their magic. A pair of Demon Sergeants can form an invisible demon gate which cut your health in half when you pass by.
The 44th floor is in a different dimension, and you can\'t get there with stairs. But you may try to teleport.
There is a secret about the 41st floor - it is perfectly symmetrical even though it doesn't seem to be.
The shape of five on a dice is actually an ancient symbol for sealing magic. Remember the symbol because it will help you in the future.
Good luck young man!
Thank you so much for freeing me. Please take this 1000 gold as a gift.
I have a blue key for 50 gold. Would you like to buy it?
I have 5 yellow keys for 50 gold. Would you like to buy them?
I have a red key for 800 gold. Would you like to buy it?
I have lots of yellow keys, 1000 gold each. Would you like to buy one?
I have a blue key for 200 gold. Would you like to buy it?
Would you like to sell your yellow keys to me for 100 gold each. I need lots of them.
I have 1 blue key and 4 yellow keys for 1000 gold. Would you like to buy them?
I have 3 yellow keys for 200 gold. Would you like to buy them?
I have 3 blue keys for 2000 gold. Would you like to buy them?
I can recover you 2000 health for 1000 gold. Would you let me do it?
I have a enhanced mattock for 4000 gold. Would you like to buy it?
Thank you. Good luck on your journey
This tower consists of 50 floors. Every 10 floors form one area, and each area has one boss guarding the entrance to the next area. To proceed, you must defeat these bosses.
When you offer gold in exchange for strength at an alter, you should put your priority on defense. However, you cannot completely ignore offense either.
Have you found the secret tunnels on the 9th, 16th, and 18th floor? I heard that there are more of them on higher floors.

When you carry a cross, your attacks will be twice as effective against zombies and the Vampire, and I don\'t think you can defeat the Vampire without it. There is a cross hidden on a floor higher than this one.
Even though the tower is said to have 50 floors, I have never heard anyone reaching to the 50th floor.
There is never a gate without Gate-Keepers, and there is always a gate when you see Gate-Keepers.
There is a Lucky Gold hidden in this tower. If you carry it with you, you will get twice as much money from battles.
I heard that the Sacred Shield can protect you against all kinds of magic powers. But I also heard that this shield is hidden on a floor which doesn't exist.
I heard that to kill the Dragon, you must have a holy sword, a holy shield, and most importantly the Dragonsbane, which doubles your attack against the Dragon.
Keep it secret, and don\'t tell others

. . . \t\t. . . \t\tup. . . \t\twake up. . .

Who am I? I am a thief, and I\'m looking for a treasure in this tower. Even though I was caught, it\'s not a big deal you know? \'cause I just need to spend a few nights digging tunnels and I will be out of here. And you are such a lucky dog, bro. \'cause I have just finished the tunnel planning to get out, and you were thrown in my cell. Follow me and let\'s get out!

Forgot to tell you, but you should have figured out by now that your weapons were taken away. It\'s not wise to fight monsters without any weapons. I know there is one old iron sword on the 5th floor, and one old iron shield on the 9th floor. I ain\'t gonna call them good weapons but still, better than nothing, right? By the way, I have dug many tunnels in this tower. I covered them to look just like regular walls, but if you are able to find them, they will help you a lot. Good luck bro. See ya.

Oh wow! You are much stronger than I thought, bro. You killed the Skeleton Captain and his soldiers all by yourself? Damn, that\'s amazing. You know thers is a silver sword on 17th floor, right? Good luck finding it. I got to go. See ya.

Wow, look at who is here! The Skeleton Captain Slayer! Did the giant octopus block your way? It\'s such a pain in the ass! I counld\'t get around it so I had to dig this tunnel. You came just in time. Enjoy this free tunnel. See you later!
Yo, bro. Nice to see ya. Sigh, I am out of luck. Can\'t find my treasure anywhere. I\'m taking some rest.

Thank you so much for saving me bro! Thought I was doomed. I got caught again, but this time they saw my mattock and took it away, so I can\'t dig tunnels to get out. But you came and saved me. I can\'t thank you enough. Is the Dragon on the 35th floor blocking your way? Don\'t you worry bro. I got your back. I have hidden my other mattocks in the tower. Let me find one frist and I will dig a tunnel for you so you can get around the Dragon.
Give me some time to find my hidden mattocks, bro. I will catch you up on the 35th floor.

Just follow the tunnel I have dug for you, and you will be on your way upstairs. After this incident, I realized that it\'s not worth risking my life looking for some treasures which may not even exist. I\'m outta here. Good luck saving the princess. Goodbye.
What? Thief!? Why are you here? Didn\'t you leave?
Haha! Pretty surprised seeing me huh? The only reason I am here is that I am Zeno!
But why? Why would you help when you could easily kill me?

Because of power. I want more power!!! The Archmage is only slightly stronger than me, but he became the owner of this tower while I was assigned to be the region boss on the 50th floor. When I found him became obsessed with his spell book, I knew my chance was coming. Before he locked himself up in his chamber trying to create the strongest spell, I managed to replace the last page of his book so he would never succeed. Later, I started to kill his minions and he did know because he has not gone out of his chamber yet. Now he is dead and I will rule this tower!
If I can kill him, what makes you think I won\'t kill you?

Because of the sacred weapons you are wielding now. According to the last page of the spell book. Both the Sacred Sword and the Sacred Shield were born in the lava. They were purified by the holy fire so they resist magic. I first tried to get these weapons myself but I almost died to the lava protecting the Sacred Shield. I realized I should better let others to do the job, and that\'s why the legend goes that there is a princess in this tower. The foolish Archmage must have used magic against you, but when he realized it was not working, it was too late, since you already killed him. Knowing this, I trained myself battling without using magic. Once I kill you and take your weapons, I would be invincible! Now is the time. Let the fight begin!

Another interloper coming for the princess! Sergeants, throw him in jail!
You are trapped!!! Soldiers, go kill him!!!
Oh nice, fresh blood! You never thought those Giant Bats were just my disguise, did you? This is how I hunt: lure the prey in, and drain their blood. mmmwwwahahahaha. . .
Haha, young man, you did a great job coming this far. If you are not afraid of death, you should go through the portal on th 24th floor I just opened. I will be waiting for you on the other side.
What? This is Zeno\'s voice. How is he not dead? And the princess is only a doll?!
. . . tear of slime, fang of bat. . . What! An intruder!!! Did you just kill all my minions?!!! I WILL SHOW YOU WHO IS THE BOSS HERE!!!
What? An interloper! It\'s been a long time since the last man make it through the Vampire. It doesn\'t matter anymore because I will kill you right here right now!
You think you are pretty strong, huh? That\'s because I didn\'t use my full strength. If you can make it to the 40th floor, I shall then fight you with my full power.
You think I am that easily defeated? You must be kidding me! What you just killed were merelly illusions. Now, it\'s my turn to kill you!
You can never defeat me! Skeleton Elites, charge!
Charge! Knight squad! Go kill him!
You will not stand a chance against my Swordsman Squad. CHARGE FORWARD!!!
He is weak now! Knight Elites, charge!!!
You angered me so much! You should really turn away and run because I am going to kill you myself!
Don\'t you dare following me! I\'m going to call some backups, and you are doomed
Oh! Lord Zeno! I. . . I am. . . I am not able to defeat this man. P. . . Ple. . . Please forgive me.
You are far too weak. You are no longer of any use. Sergeants, kill him!
No. Please, Lord Zeno. Please. Aaahh!!!

You are quite strong, young man. You can make a very good subordinate of mine. I can let you be the boss on the 40th to replace the fool I just killed. I will give you some time to think it through. You will give me your answer when we meet on the 49th floor.
You are not here to surrender yourself to me? And you want to kill me? You just made a terrible decision, and I will make sure you pay for it. Sergeants, on guard!
What? You created the symbol sealing away my magic power? You still won\'t defeat me though I only get 1/10 of my power.
